entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chambly
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Hubert Airport 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
